text: Charles Edward Locke (May 5, 1932 - January 9, 2015) was an American professional baseball player. Locke was a right-handed pitcher. He only played for the Baltimore Orioles in 1955. He was born in Malden, Missouri. Locke died in Poplar Bluff, Missouri, aged 82. ==Other websites== *Obituary Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Sportspeople from Missouri
title: Chuck Locke
